newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Three die in Swiss mission to recover dead cow.
newsitem.headline: Three die in Swiss mission to recover dead cow.

text.p: All three people on board died when a Swiss helicopter crashed in the Alps on Thursday during a mission to pick up a dead cow, officials said.

The pilot, a doctor and a paramedic were killed when the Rega air rescue chopper went down shortly after taking off from Saegistal in the Bernese Oberland, Rega said in a statement. The cause of the crash was still under investigation.

The chartered helicopter was on the way to recover a dead cow from difficult mountain terrain, a Rega spokesman said. It is standard practice for a medical crew to be on board in case they have to respond quickly to an emergency, he added.
